instructions_to_main_agent: Implement Lenis smooth scrolling immediately in the root layout.
Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings and 'Manrope' for body text. Import from Google Fonts.

The 'Beskar' theme means using the steel blue (#3d4f5f) as a subtle structural color, not a primary button color. Use White/Off-white for primary actions to create contrast against the dark background.
For the 'Tracing Beam' effect on cards: Use a motion div that follows the border path or a simple gradient border that rotates.
The 'Impact Stats' section should use massive typography (text-8xl) for the numbers.
Ensure the Contact Form uses Shadcn components but styled to match the dark/glass theme.
Do not use standard 'card' shadows. Use 'glow' effects (colored drop-shadows) sparingly.
The tagline 'This is the way' should be prominent in the Hero section, perhaps with a slow fade-in animation.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
